senselogic.sitevision.api.collaboration

Interface CollaborationGroupTemplateUtil


  • @Requireable(value="CollaborationGroupTemplateUtil")
public interface CollaborationGroupTemplateUtil
    Collaboration group template utility interface that handles nodes with primary node type sv:collaborationGroupTemplate.

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via CollaborationFactory.getCollaborationGroupTemplateUtil(). See CollaborationFactory for how to obtain an instance of the CollaborationFactory interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 3.6.4
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren
    See Also:
    TemplateUtil

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node getCollaborationGroupTemplateByName(String aCollaborationGroupTemplateName)
      Gets the first found collaboration group template that matches a given name.
      List<Node> getCollaborationGroupTemplates()
      Gets all collaboration group templates.
      Node getDefaultCollaborationGroupTemplate()
      Gets the default collaboration group template.

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultCollaborationGroupTemplate

        Node getDefaultCollaborationGroupTemplate()
        Gets the default collaboration group template.

        The default collaboration group template is the template that are used by default to create new collaboration groups (i.e. collaboration group pages).

        Permission note! Current user must have PermissionUtil.Permission.READ on default collaboration group template.

        Returns:
        the default collaboration group template, or null if indeterminable

      • getCollaborationGroupTemplateByName

        Node getCollaborationGroupTemplateByName(String aCollaborationGroupTemplateName)
        Gets the first found collaboration group template that matches a given name.

        Permission note! Only collaboration group templates that current user has PermissionUtil.Permission.READ on will be considered.

        Parameters:
        aCollaborationGroupTemplateName - name of the template
        Returns:
        a collaboration group template, or null if indeterminable (e.g. no accessible collaboration group template named aCollaborationGroupTemplateName could be found)
        Since:
        Sitevision 4.1

      • getCollaborationGroupTemplates

        List<Node> getCollaborationGroupTemplates()
        Gets all collaboration group templates.

        Permission note! The list will only contain collaboration group templates that current user has PermissionUtil.Permission.READ on.

        Returns:
        all collaboration group templates, or empty list if there are no accessible collaboration group templates.
        Since:
        Sitevision 4.1

Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
